name: Taxbees
overview:
Taxbees is a payroll processing firm serving businesses pan India. Our work includes:

â€¢ Structuring salary for employees based on net payout/CTC (optional) â€¢ Creating masters based on salary structure, employees’ details, etc… â€¢ Generating TDS forms 24Q and 27Q and submitting the same/forwarding them to you for submission â€¢ Obtaining information regarding monthly attendance, variable components, new recruits, attritions, increments â€¢ Deductions for Professional Tax, Provident Fund, ESI, income tax, loan etc … â€¢ Generation of payment advice (bank transfer details) â€¢ Adjusting terminal benefits - leave encashments, gratuity etc… â€¢ Generating reports - salary register, PF forms (5/10/3A/6A/12), deductions reports, professional tax deduction reports â€¢ Generating tds challans - 281 â€¢ Emailing payslips to employees â€¢ Calculating the tax deductible for each employee for the year â€¢ Verifying investment declarations for eligibility â€¢ Generating Form 16s â€¢ Emailing Form 16s to the signing authority
